multidendrograms.forms.scrollabledesktop
Class DesktopListener

java.lang.Object
  multidendrograms.forms.scrollabledesktop.DesktopListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.ComponentListener, java.util.EventListener
public class DesktopListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ComponentListener, java.awt.event.ActionListener

This class provides common Component and Action Listeners for other objects in the system.

Version:
1.0 11-Aug-2001
Author:
Tom Tessier

actionPerformed

public void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
common actionPerformed method that responds to both button and menu events. If no action command provided in the ActionEvent, selects the frame associated with the current button / menu item (if any).

Specified by:
actionPerformed in interface java.awt.event.ActionListener
Parameters:
e - the ActionEvent
